name: iFanboy - Readability, Responsive Web Design
description:
TESTED IN CHROME ON MAC: Still need to work on Firefox.

I love iFanboy, but the site has always been difficult to read. On August 15th, 2011, they launched a new site design that added a bunch of back in features, but left some of my major pain points intact.

Unfortunately, the site seemed harder to read. So I built my first userstyle to clean up the site and make it readable.
additional_info:
aug 16 - now that /comics is working again, added some styles to make that page look a little better.


Original version. Needs cleanup as there are a lot of redundant styles. Firefox doesn’t work as expected.

Would love to move more stuff to the right column, but the page structure doesn’t make that possible. So I’m hiding some boxes that as a frequent user of the site, I don’t need. For example, I subscribe in iTunes to the various podcasts and there is a podcast page. Ergo, no need to see it on the home page.
